item.title: Indonesian Language Model
item.description:
Lingua

NLP (Natural Language Processing) has been proven useful for many industrial practitioners to gain insight and automate human-intensive labor in order to bring a better experience for their customers. Chatbot to quickly reply customersâ€™ inquiries and free text search engine to help customers express their intent towards our product in more flexible way are a few examples of the use cases.
